[MySQL 教程](http://www.runoob.com/mysql/mysql-tutorial.html)

+ 使用`sqldf`包在R中调用SQL语句

```{r 1,message = F, comment = NA,warning = F,error=T }
library(sqldf)
library(readr)
salary <- read_csv("E:/R_codes/others/nba/NBA_season1718_salary.csv")
Seasons <- read_csv("E:/R_codes/others/nba/Seasons_Stats.csv")

```


```{r 2,message = F, comment = NA,warning = F,error=T}

head(sqldf(
"SELECT Year from Seasons;"
))



```
